title: Scrub Daddy Cleaning Sponge at Bed Bath & Beyond
description: http://www.bedbathandbeyond.com/store/product/scrub-daddy-cleaning-sponge/1020094881 Perfect for all kinds of cleaning tasks, the round, smiling Scrub Daddy® sponge will not scratch any type of surface, cleans easily and won't hold any kind of debris. Innovative Flex Texture allows it to change its texture based on water temperature. Thanks for watching. Make sure to subscribe to the Bed Bath & Beyond YouTube Channel.

asset.title: Scrub Daddy Cleaning Sponge at Bed Bath & Beyond
asset.description: http://www.bedbathandbeyond.com/store/product/scrub-daddy-cleaning-sponge/1020094881 Perfect for all kinds of cleaning tasks, the round, smiling Scrub ...
asset.author: Bedbathandbeyond

transcripts: The unique smile-faced design of the Scrub Daddy allows you to access the bottom of cups, bowls, mugs, even coffee pots. And gets to the bottom and cleans the sides, by just spinning it around. It has the added feature of protecting your fingernails and your manicure from banging the surfaces that you're working on. He can get to the bottom of muffin tins and bakeware, without scratching that non-stick surface. The mouth cleans spoons, knives, forks, and spatulas. He's so cute, you can even get your kids to do the dishes.  And he stores on the sink and dries in about an hour. He won't scratch stainless-steel appliances or even the wheels of your car, which means he's usable indoors and outdoors. Even on the barbecue and on the lawn furniture, without causing any scratches. Indoors, he's great in the bathroom from removing the toothpaste and soap scum from bathtubs and showers. The uses for scrub daddy are endless, get yours today.
